QuestData.Title: Find the Boy
QuestData.Description: Have you seen my son, Lo? He was here a moment ago and I told him we were leaving today.$b$bI'm sure he's off trying to woo that young Syra Goldendraft. That is the very reason we need to leave!$b$bNo son of mine is going to run off with a Goldendraft!$b$bI'm going to search around here for them.$b$bI do keep catching those two sneaking off to the Arboretum. Any chance you could head out there and look for them?
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak with Inkmaster Wei at the Arboretum in the Jade Forest.
QuestData.RewardText: You seek two lovers blind to the ambitions of their family names. They were here, seeking a way to hold to their path.$b$bSadly they did not find their answers among the trees or art.
